name: Twilio TaskRouter Ruby Example
description: A Ruby/Twilio App for Creating a Priority Queue for your Call Centre with TaskRouter

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account's unique identifier, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account's secret key, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_WORKSPACE_SID.description: Twilio Workspace SID for workspace you want to use for this TaskRouter App

TWILIO_WORKFLOW_SID.description: Twilio Workflow SID (different from Workspace) for workspace you want to use for this TaskRouter App

TWILIO_IDLE_SID.description: Twilio Activity SID (different from Workspace) to set your Worker back to Idle after each call

PRIORITY_NUMBER.description: The Twilio phone no you wish to use to bypass the queue
